1.text: A Psalm. O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.

2.text: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.

3.text: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.

4.text: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.

5.text: Sing unto the LORD with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.

6.text: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.

7.text: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

8.text: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together

9.text: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
